data.name: Spy Sight
data.description:
Spy Sight is a fast-paced observation and memory game designed to challenge your cognitive abilities. In this game, you are presented with a grid of tiles on the floor, each featuring a different icon such as vegetables, fruits, animals, berries, bananas, apples, foxes, and more. As you observe the tiles, one of the icons will blink on each tile, testing your ability to focus and retain visual information.

Once the observation phase is complete, a picture will be displayed on the main screen, challenging you to identify the corresponding tile on the floor. With the use of hand controllers, you must move around the playing area and stand on the correct tile before the time runs out. To add to the challenge, an AI player will also be present, competing with you to stand on the correct tile.

With each level, the game becomes increasingly challenging, testing your memory and observation skills to the limit. Spy Sight is an immersive and engaging experience that will improve your cognitive abilities while providing a fun and exciting gaming experience.
